title: Drawing, early 20th century
medium: Brush and black/gray watercolor on off-white coated wove paper
markings: On verso, lower right (above inscription), Wiener Werkstatte stamp in purple.  [See notes]
inscribed: On verso, inscribed in graphite, lower right: M1.50 / KW 1165; and lower left: 1165/(3)
description: Wiener Werkstatte (Vienna Workshop) design for decorated paper: pattern of squares with scalloped edges forming a grid placed on the diagonal. Looks like combed paper or finger painted image.
